page.title: 16BLACKPOOL PLEASURE BEACH
page.content: Blackpool Pleasure Beach claims to be the largest outdoor amusement park in Europe. It takes its name from the fact that it was originally sited on the beach. The ground is now owned by the Pleasure Beach Company. They own most of the buildings and some of the rides. They also rent out sites on which other people put rides. In addition to the rides there are many other attractions. The Ice Drome has an Ice Show during the Summer Season. Blackpool Seagulls Ice Hockey Team also use the Ice Drome for their matches. Unlike the rides the Ice Drome is open all year. Near the main entrance of the Pleasure Beach is the White Tower Restaurant and Horseshoe Cabaret Bar, there are also several public bars and amusment arcades. The oldest ride is Sir Maxim's Flying Machine the newest the Space Invader.
